activities: Processing of on-line and off-line data related to financial services provided by affiliated companies based in the EU in concert with providing management and consulting services to such affiliated companies. Processing of human resources data from affiliated companies based in the EU.
personaldata: Organization, client, credit reference data, customer, and employee data. Data includes manually processed data.
recoursemech: Employee data - EU data protection authorities (DPAs); Non-employee data - American Arbitration Association (ICDR/AAA Safe Harbor program)
